cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4258, Improving Digital Identity Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FOSTER:
H.R. 4258.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H3580]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 15.

title: Improving Digital Identity Act of 2021
